content.detailedDescription:
Great smoky mtns. nat. park 8/10/13 approx. 10:30 pm
i was driving home from work through park and noticed a truck in front of me going really slow, as i get up behind them i see object out of corner of my eye (it's what truck was looking at) i just saw it for a couple of seconds...It was eggish shaped with pink/white lights 3/4 of the way down on object...At first i thought it might be fireworks but there are suppose to not be any in park? it reminded me of a "sparkler" misty around it and the sky was lite up around it...Then it disappeared behind trees. i've seen stuff before but not like this...It seemed to be very close...I could see shape, lights and craft it's self... i came to your site to see if people in truck reported it, when i saw they had not i thought i would :-) i had chill bumps come up over my entire body and i started crying ???? probably strangest thing i have ever seen and no i wasn't smoking anything lol
thanks !!
content.summary: I was driving home thru park after working in gatlinburg....Saw truck going really slow in front of me and i was wondering why? then i saw ufo out of corner of my eye...Egg shaped with "sparkler" type lights around bottom...It disappeared behind trees

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were sitting out on out backyard deck in cambridge ontario canada june 12 2013 at 4:46 in the afternoon looking towards the nnw direction when i spotted what i thought was a hot air balloon floating in the sky about 1 (guessing) mile away.There were no clouds in a bright blue sky so the objects were highly visible. i took a picture thinking nothing of it until later when i noticed that it did not look like a balloon at all and then i notice the cylindrical object to the left of it,just out of focus.

it was hovering as described and moving very slowly left to right then went behind the tree you can see in the picture. i said to my wife i'll wait until it comes out the other side of the tree but it never did.

if you zoom in, you can see ( the left object) it's cylindrical and appears to have extensions protruding out the end. this is an unedited photo taken with my canon g10 at 5megapixels. i kick myself now because i dialed the file size down to 5 to fit more pictures on the card and lost much detail doing that .

everyone i've shown this to admits it's a ufo and does not look like anything else as far as i'm concerned. as for the object to the left, i've seen tv coverage on some (ufo hunters) programs that shows similar objects in some episodes.

i have never seen 2 separate objects in any ufo pictures ever and think this is quite unique as though the round object came from the cylindrical object.
content.summary: Double sighting of cylinder and disc crafts in broad daylight june 2013

content.detailedDescription:
One winters evening, with clear sky and nice bright stars. i had just finished watching tv and went to my garden, to take out the rubbish for the following day. i have no idea what made me look in that direction, but i noticed a large black triangular craft, making hardly any noise. it was blacker than the night sky and had defined edges.

i observed the craft for about a minute as it was only at a high of a few hundred feet and was moving very slowly. when it was right above me, the strangest thought went through my mind "it's only birds" which only long after the event makes no sense at all. it wasn't a giant, silent, triangular bird and that's for sure. it was a solid object and was real! another strange thing was, i didn't get a camera or go to the front of the house, or get anyone else to come and have a further look.

i am not saying it was from space, but man we really don't know what's going on, even in our own backyards.

i have never seen anything else like this in all these years and really hope i never will again.

i am not going to remain anonymous about this sighting, i know what i saw and it is only long after the event, it became clear.
content.summary: Large black triangle above a former property.

content.detailedDescription: The evening of august 14th, 2013, my wife and 9 year old son and i went for a walk.  we usually walk about 30 minutes in the evening almost every night and at about 20 minutes into the walk we saw what we thought was a single airplane that had suddenly appeared at about 30 to 35 degrees above the horizon.  i can only guess that it must be a few miles south west of the luke air force base immediately to our southwest.  i didn't remember seeing it the moment before but we were engaged in conversation.  as i watched it, it appeared to be stationary and a much duller color than the fighter jets that we normally see traversing the skyway. it was silent but it was so far away that didn't bother me as jets at that same distance would have been virtually silent where we were. the fighter jets we normally see had a bright almost car-headlight white light when approaching you.  these orbs (for lack of a better term) were a much dimmer yellow/orange or amber color.  i drew my wife's attention to it and while i was discussing with her what it could be, it appeared to move to the right about 1 time it's own width and behind it was another amber light.  then it appeared that another light moved from directly behind it to the left and revealed itself from behind the second one.  this continued to happen on both sides of the first light/orb until it appears there was a straight line of 8 yellow lights, further convincing me these were not military aircraft.  the whole time the hovered and never rose or decreased in altitude.  they only moved left and right slowly and smoothly.  once they reached the stopping point they appeared to hover like this for several minutes and then slowly faded out like someone had them on a dimmer switch and faded them from full brightness (which was not really bright to begin with) to completely dark within 2.5 seconds in a nice smooth fadeout.  as soon as the outermost one on the right faded completely out, the next 3 to it's left faded out and finally all faded out except for the first orb.  then after 10 seconds or so of it being the final, remaining orb, it too then faded out completely.  then all were gone.  they appeared to be southwest of the air base and i would say they might be over goodyear, az or almost to the estrella mountain range.
content.summary: Late evening walk in city of surprise we witnessed amber/orange orbs

content.detailedDescription: This is the third time in the past 6 months that i've seen this large object/aircraft in the night skies over the metro denver area. at roughly 4:15am on 8/14/13 i was driving westbound on 6th ave. 1/2 a mile away from the exit at wadsworth (south bound exit). i spotted an aircraft(?) above the walmart near 1st and wadsworth- roughly... just guessing, helicopter flight elevation, slow moving west to east. what struck me was how this craft resembled the previous two sightings i witnessed this year. the aircraft seems to be larger than a commercial airliner, with three bright white 'led' lights on the front forward facing underside and a smaller flashing white 'led' on the wingtip. the speed it was traveling was slow, possibly 90mph. as i drove off 6th ave. onto southbound wadsworth i could see the back underside of the aircraft. like my two previous sightings the underside 'flat pattern' of the yellowish lower lights is honeycombed patterned, triangle shaped layout i guess; non flashing. from this angle, looking directly at the back of the aircraft i could now see two flashing 'led' lights on the wingtips. and again, with my window rolled down, no sound from the craft could be heard. my feelings after each time i saw this object was that of awe: this thing is awesome! i would guess that it's a new type of military aircraft, if it is, this is some insane new technology that is far more advanced than the sr-71, stealth fighters and bombers we are used to seeing. please, if anybody is awake around 3am-4:30am and you live in the jefferson county area in denver- please keep an eye on the night skies and hopefully you'll see this 'thing' too! each time i saw this craft it was flying (roughly) from the south west (morrison) foothills area towards fitzsimmons/cu medical university area (east). if mufon is interested, i am a freelance illustrator and i can do a detailed sketch of what i witnessed.
content.summary: Large dark triangle aircraft with bright underside lights, made no sound

content.detailedDescription: Walked out of hose and immediately observed an extremely bright object low on the horizon. checked cell phone google sky view for natural body; venus, but nothing registered. noticed object began to move, so i decided to try and catch up to it in car. gave chase for 5 mins, but object rose higher in sky and seemed give off a dull flash and vanished.
content.summary: Notice extremely bright object hovering low. light had a tinge of red. chased in car, but disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
In july, 1977 i had a close encounter with 3 friends in a corn field on a hill top just outside christiansburg, va city limits and now am suffering with my body having been magnetically charged. my health has been severely impaired by this. 

in addition, using a computer or other electronic device causes severe pain. please call me to get more details.
content.summary: In july 1977, myself and 3 friends saw a ufo that hovered above us before disappearing at a rapid pace.

content.detailedDescription: The are is by an airport, so i see lights (airplanes) nightly. but this was different. it was like i was seeing it from a distance, but it was above me. no flashing lights. moving maybe 40 mph. orb was about 5, 6x bigger than an average airplane overhead. it took around 10 minutes to get out of sight, i saw it one second... didn't the other.
content.summary: Airplane-like orb overhead. around 40 mph moving from sw to nw.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside having a cigarette and drinking tea around 10 pm. i noticed the object as it cleared the trees across the street. it was the largest thing in the sky closest to me.  when i first noticed it i thought it was an airplane.
as i stared at it to see if it was an airplane i couldnt figure out why it was travelling so low.And i realized it was not an airplane or a helicopter.  as there was no noise of either an airplane or helicopter.  it was heading east at a constant slow speed.  it was heading east and was hidden behind a third story building.  as i was waiting for it to appear on the east side of the building i noticed it was going straight up, it reappeared from behind the 3rd story building and was stationary for approximately 3-4 seconds, at which time it started heading west at a constant slow speed.  

my feelings were of i could not understand what i was seeing, along with a scary/eerie feeling.  as the object started heading west past me, i felt a feeling of sudden alertness and calmness.  no longer afraid.

the object started heading west, past me, and i suddenly heard a car slam on its breaks at which time i ran back inside.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Old style rocket and cone with side appendages with lights

content.detailedDescription: My mother and i were vacationing in cuba at the time. a heavy storm was about to arrive and we went out onto the balcony to take some pictures of the ocean/sky. we did not notice this object at the time. only after going through our photos did we notice a bright, orb-like object in one of the pictures. there was zero chance of this being an airplane (airspace is fairly restricted in cuba and only a few flights come into varadero airport each day). there was also no chance of this being a reflection from the sun as there the cloud cover was far too dense.
content.summary: Object shows up in a photo - not witnessed by eye. photo taken outside prior to a heavy rain. no airplanes in area/reflections of any kind.

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were pulling out of my neighborhood a little after 9 p.M to go to another friends house while turning onto north belair rd. we noticed between 15 to 30 randomly pulsation, multicolored, star-like objects were randomly moving in all directions. some of the objects would occasionally pause in the air. soon after, about 10 of the objects formed in a rotating circle, while the other objects were randomly positioned in the sky around the other circling objects. this proceeded for about 30 seconds while all of the sudden all of the unidentified objects shot in multiple directions in an odd zigzag type pattern. about a year and a half later another friend and i saw nearly the same exact experience in the same exact location. they were in the sky forming the same way but with but less objects. i was shocked when these events happened. i had never seen anything like it before and i figured it was some sort of military experiment or night flight show. i have multiple witnesses that can confirm the experience. i have researched any sort of explanation for these experiences from night parachuting to every other facility in the area. this is currently unexplainable.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.shape: Circle,   Fireball,   Flash,   Oval,   Sphere,   Star-like
content.summary: 15-30 ramndom pulsation multicolored star-like objects randomly moving in all directions sometimes stopping then about 10 finally formed a rotating circle then shooting off in all different directions (while circle was formed the other leftovers randomly

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend was driving over a bridge near where we had stayed at the moment, when we came almost over the bridge, i saw a ufo or something hovering over a building. i noticed no one was out on this street. then i noticed a variety of lights scanning. it looked like it was observing the building. my reacations was like "wow" no one else is seeing this? since it was so close over the building i decided to investigate. i remebered saying to myself, if this was a ufo why would this be so close to the building where everyone can see? so i pulled my vehicle in the back of building right near the craft. i got out the car and the shape of it was like a spinning top and the bottom as well. i look up and noticed the color was a blackish grey and flashing lights. the lights were lined from the top to the bottom. the top colors was green, white and red. the lights under that was blue, white and red. next thing you know i was driving. when i'm a few minutes away from home and it was like my memory was wiped away.   my friend that was with me on that occasion had no memory of this happening. in front of my house i said to myself dang i was supposed to look at the craft. in due time little by little i started to remember what i really saw that night.
content.summary: Ufo hovered over building

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend was driving over a bridge near where we had stayed at the moment, when we came almost over the bridge, i saw a ufo or something hovering over a building. i noticed no one was out on this street. then i noticed a variety of lights scanning. it looked like it was observing the building. my reacations was like "wow" no one else is seeing this? since it was so close over the building i decided to investigate. i remebered saying to myself, if this was a ufo why would this be so close to the building where everyone can see? so i pulled my vehicle in the back of building right near the craft. i got out the car and the shape of it was like a spinning top and the bottom as well. i look up and noticed the color was a blackish grey and flashing lights. the lights were lined from the top to the bottom. the top colors was green, white and red. the lights under that was blue, white and red. next thing you know i was driving. when i'm a few minutes away from home and it was like my memory was wiped away.   my friend that was with me on that occasion had no memory of this happening. in front of my house i said to myself dang i was supposed to look at the craft. in due time little by little i started to remember what i really saw that night.
content.summary: Ufo hovered over building

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend was driving over a bridge near where we had stayed at the moment, when we came almost over the bridge, i saw a ufo or something hovering over a building. i noticed no one was out on this street. then i noticed a variety of lights scanning. it looked like it was observing the building. my reacations was like "wow" no one else is seeing this? since it was so close over the building i decided to investigate. i remebered saying to myself, if this was a ufo why would this be so close to the building where everyone can see? so i pulled my vehicle in the back of building right near the craft. i got out the car and the shape of it was like a spinning top and the bottom as well. i look up and noticed the color was a blackish grey and flashing lights. the lights were lined from the top to the bottom. the top colors was green, white and red. the lights under that was blue, white and red. next thing you know i was driving. when i'm a few minutes away from home and it was like my memory was wiped away.   my friend that was with me on that occasion had no memory of this happening. in front of my house i said to myself dang i was supposed to look at the craft. in due time little by little i started to remember what i really saw that night.
content.summary: Ufo hovered over building

content.detailedDescription: First, this is the exact object filmed over japan on july 26 2013 ( youtube) ,if not the same vehicle itself.I saw it in distance,& it looked bigger then a jet should be,there were clouds in distance to get somewhat of a gauge.It went straight, no arch.Which means it had to be far from me perspective wise. one dark stripe verticle dead center the rest was white ,,white cigar shaped with a flat bottom but as it moved, the stripe did not change, as it would if it wer e a wing. then the sun reflected off of it in an unexplainable way, considering the shape, it appeared to be. the light was in a flat line on top as it went to back of vehicle.Then went down the back of it, arched 1/4 of a circle, then forward a bit and ended.Although the object appeared white, the reflection was gold. it did not make any sense that the reflection should have came from the back, considering where i was and where the vehicle was. it was wrong for a cigar, or a round, flat object. all i could figure was the back had to have been concave. the reflection off the sun made no sense. the sun was behind me and to my left. the reflection should have came near center, back. not forward.( my job was to draw buildings before they were built from blue prints, so i know about perspective and light. we were taught to think in " cad" before there were cad machines) this made no sense,unless the cigar or disc shape was not either. anyway..I watched with binoculars, it went behind a cloud, which was counties away. then did not come back into view.The only feeling i had after sighting, was that it was not normal.
content.summary: U

content.detailedDescription: I was inside watching tv when i had this almost like a voice in my head tell me to grab my camera and go outside so instinctively i ran outside with my camcorder and that's when i saw a black orb like ufo hovering and changing directions south west of where i live.
content.summary: Witnessed ufo over my home in springfield, mo

content.detailedDescription:
Flying from pullman washington to seattle.
was taking lots of pictures out the plane window.
took several photos of mt. rainier to make sure one would be good.
got home to sacramento that evening and next day downloaded the photos.
noticed the object was in the photo but not in the next shot 10 seconds later. thought you might want to look at it. zooming in on the photo it did not appear to be a plane . photo's included. dscn 1314 is the first shot with the object in it. dscn 1315 is the second shot and the object is gone.
the time on the photo said pm, but it was really am. i guess the camera was set wrong.
content.summary: Taking photos of mt. rainier and did not see object until photos were put on computer the next day.

content.detailedDescription: A friend and myself were sat in the park waiting for night to come to watch the perseids meteor shower when out of the corner of my eye i caught a light blink on approx 80o above us. my friend was facing myself so would have noticed the light behind me, so i can make a good assumption it did appear from nowhere! at that time it was far too light to see any other stars, this object was self emitting its own brilliant pulsing white light; i could also make out it was shaped like an upside down teardrop. to add i was using my smart phone to check for any satellites and the i.S.S, none were in the area, anyhow it was far too bright to be an object outside our atmosphere the sun was not long set and as said stars were barely visible. we continued to watch for about 5 to 10 min`s as it disappeared to the south and into the haze and cloud bank. as for its altitude, it was above the scattered clouds and easily shone through any clouds it passed over. it must have been huge in relation to its height. i tried to film it with my phone but unfortunately i don`t have a zoom function. a commercial jet a380 passed to its right just before it appeared. despite its mundane trajectory my friend and i both agreed it was very strange. i have seen similar objects in the area before.
content.summary: Very bright star blinked on from nowhere above us then moved south.

content.detailedDescription: While on patrol i drove right under a black round object that moved like a bird. it was the size of a gym ball. did not scare me at all, it did not seem  intelligent to me, it was just there. there are no wires in the area.  it was close to the road about streetlight height (was not a street light. it was on the i-15 north around deer springs road 1:50 am past escondido.
content.summary: Drove under black ball over n i-15 escondido

content.detailedDescription: I was having a great time on my rooftop when everything went wrong.`i was on my rooftop watching shooting stars when i noticed a shadow on the pine tree reflected from my streetlamp that would last for a second i was thinking it was just a bug or a bird so i wasnt concerned. but a bug or a bird make noises, flutter and wont leave you alone and you definitely dont ... have a weird different feeling afterwards. this thing did not make a single noise, was to me then gone in a few seconds like a hawk swooping in at 1000 km per hour and i know exactly how fast that is because i see jets all the time because i live near an air force base and i was seriously freaked out.But even though it was swooping, there was no noise in fact it was like there was a controlled absence of noise if that makes any sense. so i started paying more attention and noticed how the stars would get blocked out as a moving circular shape moved towards me then leaving like a boomerang.Then i noticed this because i was hyperventilating but thinking "oh maybe youre seeing things, so i kept my eyes wide open it kept on coming and each time i would see a bit more. after the 5th in around two hours (thats what it felt like) time i was so bloody freaked out.I never kept track of the time even though after a while i thought i should because in the beginning i thought "oh youre just tired and getting a bit crazy" and at the end i didnt keep track of the time because i was so freaked out and just wanted to leave. it felt like ten minute intervals (i was so sure it was nothing but at the end i wanted to get the hell outa there but this was some freaky s**t. i nearly fell as i tried to get off my roof because i was shaking so bad and it was around 8 minutes since i saw the last one so i thought its coming so  i went down the stair railing grabbed the door knob jumped inside my heart racing and i though oh f**k its gonna come inside for me so i went downstairs to where my grandma was sleeping because she snores and thought maybe just maybe that would mask my heavy scared breathing and curled up in a little ball tried not to move a muscle for an hour and even tried not to think about it because  thought maybe they could pick up on that on their radar or tracking technology(since i was so so so scared i didnt want to take any chances or risks couldnt sleep all night was so scared i didnt want to wake anyone up in case they started yelling and that might grab their attention and more people would be affected. i told my brother as soon as i thought it was possible and safe and what really freaked me out is he believed me because he saw a ufo (different one though)exact same area around the same time of night just a few days ago all i can say is that im not going to be able to sleep for a couple of nights unless i take a heavy sleep drug or something and i dont think i want to in case i have nightmares and im never going up on my roof or anywhere in the night time alone again. im just so happy im alive and have all my body parts and my mind works properly however maybe just maybe if i got that hypnosis thing like in the movie 4th kind maybe just maybe after my mind was probed something nasty would show up. sorry for all the rambling i am freakedout of my mind.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: On my rooftop noticed a swoop like movement like a hawk coming towards me then leaving in one second

content.detailedDescription:
About 11:15 pm in my backyard, i was reviewing the sky.  i am a amateur astronomer, so it is something i do.    noticed a triangle object directly overhead.  the flying object visibly a triangle (no visible wings, was able to visualize the shape) and on each point of the triangle flying object bright yellow / gold lights (not blinking or pulsating)  no noise.  flying object moving out of the west flying east.  object was flying in a straight path. i continued to watch until it moved beyond my sight.
i didn't notice any planes in the area.  

i was disappointed i didn't have my phone or camera to take a photograph. i plan to make sure that doesn't happen again.
content.summary: Noticed a quiet tringel object with three lights located at each point of the triangle.  lights were not blinking or changing colors,

content.detailedDescription:
this object have been observed from this location multiple times, and have been reported to mufon several time too. 

  object first spotted with a security camera that was scanning the sky at 7:45pm, it was visible to the naked eye but very hard to see if you did not know where to look at, this object stayed in the general area of the sky until 8:15pm until it was fading slowly away. a speeding view of the footage from this camera shows that this objects made a loop in its movements. that footage is attcjed with this report.

  after the object was first spotted by this security camera, two additional cameras were setup and i was able to record extensively from a samsung camera with zoom lens and a sony hd camcorder.

 again this is a point-like, very bright point of light. since its trajectory does not follow a straight line we can infer that it is not an astronomical object or man made satellite.

 the size of the video files will make uploading all of them here almost impossible, but i will attaching the speed-up footage showing the loop and the fooatge from the samsung camera with zoom.
content.summary: Star-like object first spooted on the north-east direction, about 45 degrees over the horizon

content.detailedDescription: I was in my back yard with my son and my dog and we were just sitting outside and i took a few pictures of some stars that i could get into focus with my camcorder. when i viewed the photos later, i noticed that to the left of the object there was an image so i magnified it and saw an object. i definitely believe that it is not another star, but some kind of ufo. it was further away then the star and it had a distinct shape. i'm sending two (2) pictures of the object. one is the normal pic the other is the object magnified.
content.summary: I took a picture of the star but when i viewed it on my computer i saw something else.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my brother witnessed this strange occurance we live less than a quarter  mile from the owensboro airport so we see a variety of airplanes daily but this sighting was cicular at times then it would slowly change to a cigar shape and it was so super huge compared to a airplane estimated size would be around 600 yards in circumferance it was silver in color it would hover for a minuete then it would appear in a lower or higher altitude in very fast movements .Then hover again.  the size was so large a airplane went over the object and the plane looked so tiny in comparison  immediantly me and my brother called a freind of ours at the airport and he said several of them seen the same thing we did but would not report it in fear of losing their jobs .. but he said when he saw it it was exactly what me and my brother seen. according to our freind at the owensboro airport.  so toatal people veiwed this was 6 people  me and my brother and 4 people at the airport.  our freind at the airport said they estimated the size of this ufo at 600 yards in diamater the largest thing i ever seen in the sky especially in late afternoon brioght hot daytime
content.summary: me and my brother saw a cicular silver object that changed into a cigar shape and hovered and changed shape and it was daytime 4 in the afternoon it was very large and very close to the owensboro airport   we see planes everyday this was not a plane

content.detailedDescription: Noticed in western sky amber light morph to red. it appeared to be a plasma ball or orb. appeared very large no sound. was unsure at first what i was seeing. the object made a slow turn toward the west and vanished. fist time to ever see anything like this. i know what i observed was no aircraft i am aware of there were no navagation lights visable, i have digital video of event. will download when transfered from video disc to computer.
content.summary: Observed sipper lookinh con trail went into house to get camera when came back out with camera observed just after dark

content.detailedDescription: Dad came home and told us of an orange orb in the sky. we went to look and could not tell it's distance or size. after a couple minutes it turned reddish and faded away. an hour or so later, we were outside again, admiring the night sky when it appeared again larger and orange. within the space of a minute, the orb moved quickly in a southerly direction, turned and traveled east, hooked around a star diagonally, and northeast then turned reddish again, appeared to grow smaller and then disappear once again.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Orange orb observed on two separate occasions by multiple people from the same vantage point in a single night

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i were sitting in the car around 12:55 am on august 14, 2013. i was looking down at a book and he was looking at his phone as well. for some reason he looked up and yelled so i then looked up too. we both saw something pretty big that looked like a green fire ball/shooting star (but much bigger) falling from the sky. it looked like a green fireball with a long tail of green fire as well. right before it got to the tree line it seemed to slow down almost like it had released a parachute. it then either went out or disappeared behind trees but right before we lost sight of it it turned white and then red. it was extremely bright especially compared to anything else in the sky. we see planes all the time and it was much, much bigger and much brighter. the whole thing lasted around 3 or 4 seconds and then was gone. we were amazed and extremely confused because we had never seen anything like it in the sky.
content.summary: Green light with tail falling quickly in sky

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i stepped outside around 1120 pm to have a smoke. i was looking up towards the south-south east sky when i noticed two lights, about the size of a star, moving in a straight line towards the north east, one following the other, with the trailing light seeming to be "towed". i thought my eyes were playing tricks on me but my wife noticed them about the same time i did. they did not appear to be any plane or satellite that i have ever observed. as i said before, the trailing light seemed like it was being towed by the leading light. they did not change direction and kept a constant speed and distance between them. the "towed" object looked like a car being towed by another car with a rope...It looked like the "rope" was slacking and then the leading light would pull it tight causing the towed object to jerk or wobble. as the lights got dimmer as they traveled,  starting at about the brightness of a medium brightness star to almost no light. the entire sighting lasted about 1-2 minutes. please contact me if more info will help. thankw for doing what you do and someday the truth will be revealed!
content.summary: Two lights flying almost overhead

content.detailedDescription: On august 13th at 10:30pm i walked into my upstairs bed room and my attention was immediately drawn to my bedroom window.  there was an extremely bright star like object hovering and slowly moving left to right in my field of view.  i called my wife to the window to make sure i was actually seeing what i had been seeing.  together we watched the object for about 3 more minutes as it changed shape and color several times as we watched.  after about 3 min the object changed into more of a solid orb shape and started heading to the sout
content.summary: Star like object seen changing shape and hovering

content.detailedDescription:
I am a veteran police officer and i was sitting in my patrol car in a parking lot (parked facing east) on the eastside of ann arbor, mi when this incident occurred just after midnight. 

weather conditions were at the time (i checked as soon as this event was over with weather.Gov for ann arbor municipal airport) - 56', clear skies, n wind 7mph, visability 10miles.  skies were dark with minimal surface lights at the location i was sitting.  i could see planes and stars in the distance from my location.  detroit metro aiport is about 25 miles east of this location

i noticed a reddish glowing object (with a bright white center) approaching from the north relatively low in the horizon sky.  the object was extremely bright and emitted a constant glow which stood out against the black clearness behind it.  there were no blinking/flashing lights associated with the object that a plane or helicopter would have so i was not sure what it was.  it was moving at what appeared to be a relatively quick,constant pace.

as it got closer, i could tell it was high off the ground (but nowhere near as high as planes in the background).  i could not make out the actual size as there was nothing behind it to visually compare with and the glow masked or covered any actual shape. 

it passed in front of my patrol car at about 75 degrees off the horizon as i had to tilt my head up and lean forward towards the windshield when it passed overhead in front of my location.  the object made no noise whatsoever.  there was no vehicular traffic or other background noise occuring at the time... there was no police chatter on my radio.  it was complete silence when it passed over my location.  i tried to light the object up with my spotlight but it did not reflect any light.  the glow was much brighter than my spotlight beam. 

as it started to get overhead, i began to film it with my in-car video system (moving the mounted camera with my hand).  i followed the object with my video and was able to zoom in on it before it had gotten too far south (out of camera view). the object was recorded on my video from 00:06:27hrs to 00:07:07hrs (40 seconds)

once it was past my video viewing range, i stepped out of my patrol car and tried to spotlight it again but it was out of the spotlight's range.  i continued to watch the light as it continued south and eventually it was out of sight. as it moved away, the glow remained constant but the size of the object got much smaller until it disappeared.  the speed of the object appeared to remain constant as did the path.

moments after losing sight of the object (which was well above any trees or structures), i observed a split-second flash/streak of light at a 45 degree angle left towards the east (between the distant horizon and sky/space).

the whole sighting event (from first observation north to when i lost sight of the object south) was about 2 min 30 sec.  the distance the object covered (moving north to south) from when i first noticed it i would estimate to be about 15-20 miles.
content.summary: Observed reddish glowing object pass from north to south nearly over my parked police car.  silent. ten mile visability - clear skies. out of view in 2.5min... then saw diagnal flash/streak of light - 45 degrees - between horizen to sky/space.
